course_title: Infectious Disease Dynamics: Theory and Models
class_notes: This is an online synchronous course.  Pre-requisite is knowledge of R via RSPH courses or independent learning prior to beginning of class is required.
course_description: This course will present the conceptual theory, mathematical framework, and computational tools to conduct mechanistic modeling of infectious diseases.
sections: Class Nbr: 4688, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 9-11:50a, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
